summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the construction of Contract No. 6-A (South Bayview Street) of the Rainier Hanford Diagonal Watershed Sewer Improvement Project to separate existing combined sewers in the area generally bounded by Rainier Avenue on the west, 31st Avenue South on the east, South Bayview Street on the south and South Charles Street on the north, and a section of Rainier Avenue extending from South Lane Street to South Jackson Street, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
